adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Allows them to adapt quickly to most situations.

elvenMagic.name: Elven Magic
elvenMagic.description: Elves are naturally attuned to nature and nature magic so they are more powerful when it comes to magic and dealing with plants, animals, and nature-based situations.

magic afinity.description: Elves are more attuned to magic and master nature-based spells much faster than other races.

natureAffinity.name: Nature Affinity
natureAffinity.description: Elves are more attuned to nature and are far more skilled at dealing with nature-based situations.

primalSenses.name: Primal Senses
primalSenses.description: Possesses the heightened senses of a wild animal, making them difficult to ambush.

keenSenses.description: Passively increases chance to detect hidden enemies, traps, and tracks.

elementalAffinity.name: Elemental Affinity
elementalAffinity.description: As a being of raw elemental energy, you are resistant to your own element but vulnerable to its opposite.

elementalResistance.description: Grants resistance to a specific element (e.g., fire, ice) but also a weakness to its opposing element.

willOfTheGrave.name: Will of the Grave
willOfTheGrave.description: Your undead nature makes you immune to poison and disease, and resistant to being charmed or put to sleep.

undeadNature.description: Immune to poison, disease, and sleep effects. Vulnerable to holy and fire damage.

stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
stonecunning.description: Dwarves have a natural affinity for stone and metal, granting them superior crafting and mining skills.

masterCraftsman.description: Increased success chance and quality when crafting or mining. Can spot unusual stonework.

dwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
dwarvenResilience.description: Their hardy nature gives them a natural resistance to poisons and magic.

hardy.description: High chance to resist poison and magical effects.

battleRage.name: Battle Rage
battleRage.description: In the heat of battle, an orc can enter a rage, ignoring pain and fighting with savage intensity.

berserk.description: Temporarily increases attack and strength, but lowers defense. Can be activated once per combat.

naturalIllusionist.name: Natural Illusionist
naturalIllusionist.description: Gnomes have an innate talent for minor illusions and trickery.

minorIllusion.description: Can create a small sound or image to distract foes. High chance of success on non-magical creatures.

infernalResistance.name: Infernal Resistance
infernalResistance.description: Born of fire and shadow, demons possess a natural resistance to fire damage.

fireResistance.description: Reduces incoming fire damage. Vulnerable to holy damage.

regenerativeScales.name: Regenerative Scales
regenerativeScales.description: Lizardmen can slowly regenerate from wounds and regrow lost limbs over time.

regeneration.description: Slowly recovers health over time, both in and out of combat.

halflingLuck.name: Halfling Luck
halflingLuck.description: Halflings have an uncanny knack for avoiding disaster at the last second.

lucky.description: Gives a chance to re-roll a failed skill check or saving throw once per day.

hellishRebuke.name: Hellish Rebuke
hellishRebuke.description: When hit by an enemy, a tiefling can use their reaction to lash out with infernal fire.

fireLash.description: As a reaction to taking damage, deal fire damage back to the attacker.

celestialResistance.name: Celestial Resistance
celestialResistance.description: Your celestial heritage grants you resistance to holy and necrotic damage.

divineBlood.description: Reduces incoming holy and necrotic damage.

healingHands.name: Healing Hands
healingHands.description: An angel can touch a creature to mend its wounds.

layOnHands.description: Heal a target (or self) for a moderate amount of health. Usable once per day.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: Can assume the form of certain creatures they have studied or defeated.

changeShape.description: Allows the use of the `transform <creature>` command.

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Can magically create a sphere of magical darkness.

shroud.description: Creates an area of darkness that blinds enemies and gives you an advantage on stealth checks.

voidwalk.name: Voidwalk
voidwalk.description: Can briefly step into the void to teleport a short distance.

blink.description: Instantly move to a nearby location, useful for escaping or repositioning.

aquaticMastery.name: Aquatic Mastery
aquaticMastery.description: Merfolk are born of the sea and possess natural swimming abilities and water breathing, allowing them to thrive in aquatic environments.

waterBreathing.description: Can breathe underwater indefinitely and swim at incredible speeds. Reduced movement on land.

mechanicalResilience.name: Mechanical Resilience
mechanicalResilience.description: Androids are artificial beings with mechanical bodies, granting them immunity to biological effects but vulnerability to electrical and electromagnetic interference.

artificialNature.description: Immune to poison, disease, fatigue, and mind control. Vulnerable to electrical damage and EMP effects.

webSpinning.name: Web Spinning
webSpinning.description: Arachnids can produce strong, sticky webs to trap enemies and create environmental advantages.

webTrap.description: Can create webs to slow or trap enemies. Also grants climbing abilities on walls and ceilings.

hiveCoordination.name: Hive Coordination
hiveCoordination.description: Bee-men work best in groups and can produce honey with healing properties and communicate through pheromones.

teamwork.description: Gains bonuses when fighting alongside allies. Can produce healing honey and sense danger through pheromones.

aerialGrace.name: Aerial Grace
aerialGrace.description: Birdmaids possess the gift of flight and exceptional eyesight, allowing them to soar through the skies and spot details from great distances.

flight.description: Can fly and hover, gaining aerial movement and enhanced perception. Vulnerable to strong winds and enclosed spaces.

felineReflexes.name: Feline Reflexes
felineReflexes.description: Cats possess supernatural agility and always land on their feet, granting them exceptional dodge capabilities and night vision.

nineLives.description: Enhanced dodge chance, fall damage immunity, and superior night vision. Can squeeze through tight spaces.

chargeAttack.name: Charge Attack
chargeAttack.description: Centaurs combine human intellect with equine strength and speed, capable of devastating charge attacks and superior archery skills.

trampling.description: Can perform powerful charge attacks that deal extra damage. Enhanced movement speed and archery accuracy.

multiFormNature.name: Multi-Form Nature
multiFormNature.description: Chimeras possess traits from multiple creatures, granting them diverse abilities and resistances from their various animal parts.

adaptiveTraits.description: Can access different abilities based on dominant animal traits. Resistant to various damage types but unstable in form.

trueSight.name: True Sight
trueSight.description: Cyclops possess a single, powerful eye that can see through illusions and focus energy into devastating eye beams.

eyeBeam.description: Can fire a powerful energy beam from their eye and see through all illusions and invisible entities.

deepWaterCommand.name: Deep Water Command
deepWaterCommand.description: Dagon are ancient sea entities with command over water and storms, capable of summoning tidal forces and commanding sea creatures.

tideControl.description: Can manipulate water currents, summon storms, and command aquatic creatures. Enhanced underwater abilities.

dragonBreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonBreath.description: Dragons and their kin possess mighty breath weapons, scaled hide for protection, and ancient magical knowledge.

elementalBreath.description: Can breathe elemental attacks (fire, ice, lightning, etc.). Natural armor and resistance to magic.

divineBlessing.name: Divine Blessing
divineBlessing.description: Demi-gods possess partial divine essence, granting them supernatural abilities and resistance to mortal ailments.

celestialPower.description: Enhanced all attributes, resistance to negative effects, and can call upon minor divine interventions.

artificialLife.name: Artificial Life
artificialLife.description: Dolls are animated constructs that feel no pain and can be repaired rather than healed, but are vulnerable to specific types of damage.

constructNature.description: Immune to pain, fear, and biological effects. Can be repaired with materials instead of healing magic.

loyalCompanion.name: Loyal Companion
loyalCompanion.description: Dogs possess unwavering loyalty, keen scent tracking abilities, and natural pack hunting instincts.

packMentality.description: Enhanced tracking abilities, bonus when fighting alongside allies, and can sense emotions and intentions.

psychicDrain.name: Psychic Drain
psychicDrain.description: Dream-Eaters feed on thoughts, dreams, and psychic energy, capable of entering minds and causing sleep effects.

mentalVampirism.description: Can drain enemy mana/stamina through psychic attacks and cause sleep or confusion effects.

treeHeart.name: Tree Heart
treeHeart.description: Dryads have a deep connection with nature, gaining power from forests and capable of plant magic.

natureControl.description: Can control plant life, create barriers of thorns, and regenerate health while in natural environments.

pixieDust.name: Pixie Dust
pixieDust.description: Fairies are magical beings with the ability to fly and cast enchantments with their mystical dust.

flightAndMagic.description: Can fly to avoid ground attacks and cast charm, shrink, or confusion spells on enemies.

wolfPack.name: Wolf Pack
wolfPack.description: Fernirs are powerful wolf-like beings with pack hunting instincts and enhanced senses.

packHunter.description: Gains damage bonus when fighting alongside allies and can track enemies through scent.

wishMagic.name: Wish Magic
wishMagic.description: Genies are powerful magical beings capable of granting wishes and manipulating reality on a limited scale.

minorWish.description: Can cast powerful spells, manipulate elements, and grant small beneficial effects to allies.

spectralForm.name: Spectral Form
spectralForm.description: Ghosts are incorporeal beings that can phase through physical matter and drain life energy.

phaseWalk.description: Can become intangible to avoid physical attacks and drain health from enemies on contact.

colossalMight.name: Colossal Might
colossalMight.description: Giants possess enormous size and strength, capable of devastating physical attacks and intimidation.

crushingBlow.description: Deals massive damage with area effect attacks and can intimidate smaller enemies into fleeing.

divineGrace.name: Divine Grace
divineGrace.description: Goddesses wield divine power and can bestow blessings or call upon celestial forces.

divineBlessings.description: Can heal allies, purify negative effects, and summon divine light to damage undead enemies.

constructBody.name: Construct Body
constructBody.description: Golems are artificial beings made of stone, metal, or clay with incredible durability and magical resistance.

stoneForm.description: Immune to poison and disease, highly resistant to magic, and can repair themselves over time.

adaptiveNature.name: Adaptive Nature
adaptiveNature.description: Hybrids possess traits from multiple races, allowing for versatile abilities and adaptation.

versatility.description: Can temporarily mimic racial abilities from other races and adapt to different combat situations.

multiHeaded.name: Multi-Headed
multiHeaded.description: Hydra-people have multiple heads granting enhanced awareness and regenerative abilities.

regeneration.description: Can regenerate from wounds quickly and has multiple consciousness streams for enhanced reflexes.

scavengerPack.name: Scavenger Pack
scavengerPack.description: Hyenas are cunning pack hunters with powerful jaws and the ability to find resources in harsh environments.

crushingBite.description: Delivers devastating bite attacks and can locate hidden items or weakened enemies.

fireElemental.name: Fire Elemental
fireElemental.description: Ifrits are powerful fire djinn capable of manipulating flames and surviving in extreme heat.

flameControl.description: Can create fire attacks, become immune to heat damage, and ignite enemies on contact.

charmingAura.name: Charming Aura
charmingAura.description: Incubi are seductive demons that can manipulate emotions and drain energy through attraction.

seduction.description: Can charm enemies to fight for them temporarily and drain stamina through emotional manipulation.

hopingUndead.name: Hoping Undead
hopingUndead.description: Jiangshis are Chinese vampires that move by hopping and possess supernatural strength and life-draining abilities.

lifeDrain.description: Can drain life force from enemies to heal themselves and move with supernatural speed despite rigid form.

serpentLower.name: Serpent Lower
serpentLower.description: Lamias have snake-like lower bodies granting enhanced mobility and the ability to constrict enemies.

constrict.description: Can wrap around enemies to immobilize them and delivers venomous strikes with enhanced reach.

luckyCharm.name: Lucky Charm
luckyCharm.description: Leprechauns are magical beings associated with luck, mischief, and the ability to find and create gold.

fortunesFavor.description: Can increase critical hit chances, find rare items, and conjure temporary gold for transactions.

succubusCharm.name: Succubus Charm
succubusCharm.description: Low-Level Lilims are lesser demons with seductive powers and the ability to manipulate desires.

emotionalDrain.description: Can charm enemies briefly and drain small amounts of mana through seductive influence.

poisonousScream.name: Poisonous Scream
poisonousScream.description: Mandrakes are plant-like beings whose screams can paralyze enemies and whose roots contain toxic properties.

paralyticCry.description: Can emit a scream that stuns enemies and release toxic spores that poison nearby foes.

vaporForm.name: Vapor Form
vaporForm.description: Mists are ethereal beings made of living fog with the ability to become incorporeal and cloud vision.

mistWalk.description: Can become incorporeal to avoid attacks and create fog clouds that blind enemies.

royalCommand.name: Royal Command
royalCommand.description: Monarchs possess natural leadership abilities and can inspire allies while commanding respect from enemies.

inspireAllies.description: Can boost ally performance and intimidate enemies with royal presence and commanding voice.

aberrantForm.name: Aberrant Form
aberrantForm.description: Monstrosities are twisted beings with chaotic abilities and unpredictable powers that defy natural law.

chaosStrike.description: Can perform unpredictable attacks with random effects and resist mental influences due to alien nature.

shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
shapeshift.description: Mimics can perfectly imitate objects and other creatures, making them masters of deception and ambush.

perfectDisguise.description: Can transform into objects to hide or copy enemy abilities temporarily during combat.

bullRush.name: Bull Rush
bullRush.description: Minotaurs are powerful bull-headed beings with incredible strength and an innate sense of direction.

chargingAttack.description: Can perform devastating charging attacks and never get lost in mazes or complex terrain.

sporalNetwork.name: Sporal Network
sporalNetwork.description: Myconids are fungal beings that communicate through spores and can release toxic or hallucinogenic clouds.

sporalCloud.description: Can release spore clouds that confuse enemies or communicate with other fungal creatures.

naturalMagic.name: Natural Magic
naturalMagic.description: Nymphs are nature spirits with powerful magical abilities tied to natural elements like water, earth, or air.

elementalControl.description: Can control one specific natural element based on their type and heal in natural environments.

brutishStrength.name: Brutish Strength
brutishStrength.description: Ogres possess overwhelming physical power and can regenerate health by consuming defeated enemies.

smashAttack.description: Can deliver crushing blows with area damage and consume fallen foes to recover health.

demonicPower.name: Demonic Power
demonicPower.description: Oni are powerful Japanese demons with supernatural strength, magical abilities, and fierce temperaments.

rageStrike.description: Can enter berserker rage for increased damage and use demonic magic to intimidate enemies.

farmAnimal.name: Farm Animal
farmAnimal.description: Ordinary livestock have simple but practical abilities like foraging, strong stomachs, and domestic instincts.

simpleLiving.description: Can find food easily, resist poison from spoiled food, and provide resources through natural products.

aquaticLife.name: Aquatic Life
aquaticLife.description: Ordinary sea creatures are perfectly adapted to underwater life with swimming abilities and water breathing.

waterMastery.description: Can breathe underwater, swim at high speeds, and sense vibrations through water currents.

arcticSurvival.name: Arctic Survival
arcticSurvival.description: Penguins are cold-adapted creatures with excellent swimming abilities and social cooperation skills.

coldResistance.description: Immune to cold damage, can slide quickly on ice, and work together effectively in groups.

tinyMagic.name: Tiny Magic
tinyMagic.description: Pixies are tiny magical beings with the ability to fly and cast minor enchantments with their fairy dust.

miniatureFlight.description: Can fly to avoid attacks, become very small to hide, and cast minor illusion and charm spells.

etherealPhase.name: Ethereal Phase
etherealPhase.description: Phantoms are ghostly beings that can phase between physical and ethereal planes at will.

phaseShift.description: Can become intangible to avoid physical attacks and pass through solid objects temporarily.

stringControl.name: String Control
stringControl.description: Puppets are animated constructs that can manipulate their own strings and control other puppet-like objects.

marionetteMaster.description: Can control their own movement with precision and briefly manipulate enemy movements like a puppeteer.

quickHop.name: Quick Hop
quickHop.description: Rabbits have incredible speed and agility, with powerful leg muscles for jumping and quick escapes.

speedBurst.description: Can move at extreme speeds for short bursts and make powerful jumping attacks or quick retreats.

fireAffinity.name: Fire Affinity
fireAffinity.description: Salamanders are fire-based reptilian creatures with the ability to generate and control flames.

flameBreath.description: Can breathe fire, resist heat damage, and regenerate health when near fire sources.

wildStrength.name: Wild Strength
wildStrength.description: Sasquatches are massive forest-dwelling creatures with incredible strength and natural camouflage abilities.

forestBlend.description: Can become nearly invisible in natural environments and deliver devastating strength-based attacks.

wildRevel.name: Wild Revel
wildRevel.description: Satyrs are part-goat beings with musical abilities and the power to inspire revelry and confusion.

panicSong.description: Can play music that causes enemies to flee in panic or allies to become inspired and energized.

undeadResilience.name: Undead Resilience
undeadResilience.description: Skeletons are animated bones with immunity to many biological effects and the ability to reassemble.

boneRegeneration.description: Immune to poison, disease, and fatigue effects. Can partially reassemble from bone fragments.

fluidForm.name: Fluid Form
fluidForm.description: Slimes are gelatinous creatures that can change shape, absorb materials, and split into smaller versions.

absorption.description: Can absorb small objects for temporary abilities and squeeze through tight spaces.

etherealNature.name: Ethereal Nature
etherealNature.description: Spirits are supernatural beings with connections to elemental forces and the ability to interact with both physical and spiritual realms.

spiritWalk.description: Can become partially incorporeal and communicate with other spirits or ghosts.

seductivePower.name: Seductive Power
seductivePower.description: Succubi are powerful demons that drain life energy through seduction and can manipulate desires.

lifeDrain.description: Can charm enemies, drain their life force through physical contact, and gain strength from the energy.

ancientWisdom.name: Ancient Wisdom
ancientWisdom.description: Treants are ancient tree-shepherds with deep forest magic and the ability to control plant life.

forestLord.description: Can command trees and plants to aid in battle and heal rapidly when rooted in soil.

bloodThirst.name: Blood Thirst
bloodThirst.description: Vampires are undead creatures with enhanced physical abilities, life-draining fangs, and supernatural charm.

vampiricBite.description: Can drain blood to heal wounds, gain enhanced strength at night, and charm victims.

misleadingLight.name: Misleading Light
misleadingLight.description: Will o Wisps are floating lights that can lead travelers astray and manipulate their own luminescence.

hypnoticGlow.description: Can create confusing light patterns that disorient enemies and become invisible by dimming their glow.

hexCrafting.name: Hex Crafting
hexCrafting.description: Witches are magical practitioners with knowledge of curses, potions, and arcane rituals.

curseSpell.description: Can cast hexes to weaken enemies, brew temporary magical potions, and communicate with familiars.

undeadHunger.name: Undead Hunger
undeadHunger.description: Zombies are reanimated undead with an insatiable hunger for flesh and high resistance to damage.

infectionBite.description: Can potentially infect enemies with disease through bites and feel no pain from most attacks.
